snippet.title: Gun Priest - Raging Demon Hunter
snippet.description:
SHOOT, DODGE, AND CLIMB!
Climb to the end to meet and defeat the final boss!

Long ago, monsters went extinct by group of priest.
However, surviving monsters, hiding in shadows, grew its force
And began to feed upon mankind’s soul one by one.

Noticing this unsettling movement,  Priest is now gathering
His friends to embark on his journey to end all monsters!

New weapons and monsters, and it’s easy to control! 
Isn’t this the game we’ve all dreamt of?

Shall we begin this journey with Priest and his friends? 


[Game Features]
- Classic pixel style game!
- Doge, shoot, and kill!
- 50 different unique weapons!
- Unique monsters and trap for every chapter
- Easy to control! Left, right, jump
- First time seeing priest with a gun?

[How to Play]
- Dodge monsters and traps by moving left, right, and jump
- Exorcize monsters with guns
- Climb the dungeon
- Customize with unique items to fit your own style!

 
Embark on the journey to save mankind’s soul from monsters!
It’s not the character, its your skill that levels up!

How high? Far?  can you climb?
